H0.text: Hawk is classified as a decomposer.

H1.text: Mushroom is an organism classified as a decomposer.

H2.text: Mouse is classified as a decomposer.

H3.text: Grass is classified as a decomposer among the organisms listed.

A4.text: Fungi are decomposers as they release enzymes to break down decaying material and absorb nutrients.

A5.text: Decomposers are organisms that break down dead organisms and release nutrients into the environment.
